name: ddx_case_search
description: Search and retrieve real clinical cases from the DDX Learners Virtual Morning Report archive. Use this tool when you need to find a clinical case based on a specific presenting complaint or symptom. The tool searches through 600+ real patient cases and extracts the full case details from PDFs. Example: 'Find a case about chest pain' or 'Search for a patient with fever and cough'.

presenting_complaint.description: The presenting symptom or complaint to search for (e.g., 'chest pain', 'fever', 'shortness of breath', 'abdominal pain')

return_top_n.description: Number of matching cases to return (default: 3, max: 10)

extract_full_text.description: Whether to extract and return the full case text from the top match (default: true)

metadata.author: MicroTutor Team
metadata.use_case: Retrieve real clinical cases from DDX Learners archive for case generation
metadata.data_source: Clinical Problem Solving (clinicalproblemsolving.com) Virtual Morning Reports
